short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your reading lists just a click away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your reading lists just a click away!

This addon places a small button on your browser toolbar that shows you any books on the page you're reading and allows you to view those books on Shelvable.
